title: Default puller queue is too large

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

labels.name: skip-changelog
labels.description: Bugs that have never been in a released stable version, and as such excluded from the release notes

body:
Syncthing doesn't like syncing, or maybe new folders, on at least FreeBSD in 0.14.47. But I doubt it's platform dependent really. From the outside, Syncthing just stops responding to outside stimulus. Hitting it with a -QUIT gives tens of thousands of goroutines trying to serve requests.

```
root@pseudo: # grep 'handleRequest' /var/log/messages | head -5
May  1 22:42:13 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol.(*rawConnection).handleRequest(0xc4218860c0, 0x1c4d, 0xc4559165f4, 0x4, 0xc4322a14a0, 0x2d, 0xb40000, 0x20000, 0xc46e585bc0, 0x20, ...)
May  1 22:42:13 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol.(*rawConnection).handleRequest(0xc4218860c0, 0x18fc, 0xc47200a0b8, 0x4, 0xc4664e7e00, 0x2d, 0x16e0000, 0x20000, 0xc4720480c0, 0x20, ...)
May  1 22:42:13 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol.(*rawConnection).handleRequest(0xc4218860c0, 0x16a6, 0xc4457b8ed8, 0x4, 0xc456f78300, 0x2d, 0x620000, 0x20000, 0xc45c2ded20, 0x20, ...)
May  1 22:42:13 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol.(*rawConnection).handleRequest(0xc4218860c0, 0x16ad, 0xc4457b8fec, 0x4, 0xc456f78360, 0x2d, 0x17a0000, 0x20000, 0xc45c2deea0, 0x20, ...)
May  1 22:42:13 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol.(*rawConnection).handleRequest(0xc4218860c0, 0xa6e, 0xc423fbc3e8, 0x4, 0xc4403601b0, 0x2d, 0xb60000, 0x20000, 0xc43b7f46c0, 0x20, ...)
root@pseudo: # grep 'handleRequest' /var/log/messages | tail -5
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol.(*rawConnection).handleRequest(0xc4218860c0, 0x62ed, 0xc52f63a528, 0x4, 0xc531914ff0, 0x2d, 0x1360000, 0x20000, 0xc531a50120, 0x20, ...)
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol.(*rawConnection).handleRequest(0xc4218860c0, 0x62ef, 0xc52f63a530, 0x4, 0xc531915050, 0x2d, 0x60000, 0x20000, 0xc531a50160, 0x20, ...)
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol.(*rawConnection).handleRequest(0xc4218860c0, 0x62f2, 0xc52f63a53c, 0x4, 0xc5319150e0, 0x2d, 0x760000, 0x20000, 0xc531a501c0, 0x20, ...)
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol.(*rawConnection).handleRequest(0xc4218860c0, 0x62f3, 0xc52f63a540, 0x4, 0xc531915110, 0x2d, 0x15a0000, 0x20000, 0xc531a501e0, 0x20, ...)
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol.(*rawConnection).handleRequest(0xc4218860c0, 0x62f4, 0xc52f63a544, 0x4, 0xc531915140, 0x2d, 0xbc0000, 0x20000, 0xc531a50200, 0x20, ...)
root@pseudo: # grep 'handleRequest' /var/log/messages | wc -l
   21063
root@pseudo: # 
```

```
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing:       /opt/buildagent/work/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol/protocol.go:340 +0x619
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: syscall.Syscall6(0x1db, 0x668, 0xc532e2e000, 0x20000, 0x480000, 0x0, 0x0, 0x20000, 0x20000, 0x0)
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: syscall.Pread(0x668, 0xc532e2e000, 0x20000, 0x20000, 0x480000, 0xc522b85748, 0xc522b85748, 0x40df78)
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing:       /usr/local/go/src/syscall/zsyscall_freebsd_amd64.go:833 +0x7a
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: internal/poll.(*FD).Pread(0xc532e10050, 0xc532e2e000, 0x20000, 0x20000, 0x480000, 0xd96ac0, 0x429280, 0xc522b857a0)
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: os.(*File).pread(0xc52cfa2a08, 0xc532e2e000, 0x20000, 0x20000, 0x480000, 0xc522b85800, 0x744640, 0xc42036e880)

May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: os.(*File).ReadAt(0xc52cfa2a08, 0xc532e2e000, 0x20000, 0x20000, 0x480000, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/model.readOffsetIntoBuf(0xd99780, 0xc4200678b0, 0xc531914db0, 0x2d, 0x480000, 0xc532e2e000, 0x20000, 0x20000, 0x0, 0x0)
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/model.(*Model).Request(0xc4200b0000, 0xc40152a406b67730, 0x6a111ff6b0a6ad45, 0xbe968688a98767c1, 0xcacffc029a6f6a3a, 0xc52f63a4f8, 0x4, 0xc531914db0, 0x2d, 0x480000, ...)
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing: github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol.(*rawConnection).handleRequest(0xc4218860c0, 0x62e1, 0xc52f63a4f8, 0x4, 0xc531914db0, 0x2d, 0x480000, 0x20000, 0xc52fa29fa0, 0x20, ...)
May  1 22:42:14 pseudo syncthing:       /opt/buildagent/work/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/protocol/protocol.go:548 +0x1a2
```

I suspect it is something wrong with the new puller limiting system I did.
